column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Azula says : " Hey , beach bums , we 're playing next .
#Text=When she runs toward the ball , there 's just the slightest hesitation of her left foot .
#Text=I 'm willing to bet a childhood injury has weakened her .
#Text=Keep serving the ball to her left , and we 'll destroy her and the rest of her team .
#Text=Dismissed .
#Text=" Azula says : " Yes !
#Text=We defeated you for all time !
#Text=You will never rise from the ashes of your shame and humiliation !
#Text=Well .
#Text=That was fun .
#Text=" Chan says : " I 'm having a party tonight .
#Text=You should come by .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Sure .
#Text=I love parties .
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " Your friend can come , too .
#Text=" Azula says : " Uh ... What about me and my brother ?
#Text=Are n't you going to invite us ?
#Text=You do n't know who we are , do you ?
#Text=" Chan says : " Do n't you know who we are ?
#Text=We 're Chan and Ruon - Jian .
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Chan says : " But , fine , you 're invited .
#Text=Just so you know , though , some of the most important teenagers in the Fire Nation are gon na be at this party , so try and act normal .
#Text=" Azula says : " We 'll do our best .
#Text="
